sentences: James T. Horn (born August 29, 1966 in Foreman, Arkansas) is an American country music singer.
Horn recorded an album for Curb/Universal in 1997 produced by Wynn Jackson and Steve Keller.
Horn's first radio single, "If Dreams Have Wings", was released on October 29, 1996.
His second single, "Geronimo", was released on September 23, 1997.
In 2016 he records the single Glory Bound Train is chosen as song in a TV commercial for the company Multi√≥pticas dedicated to optics and eyewear sale in Spain
